member.name: IMFStreamDescriptor.GetMediaTypeHandler
member.summary: Retrieves a media type handler for the stream. The media type handler can be used to enumerate supported media types for the stream, get the current media type, and set the media type.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFStreamDescriptor.GetStreamIdentifier
member.summary: Retrieves an identifier for the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFStreamDescriptor
member.summary: Gets information about one stream in a media source.
